LanguageData.AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.Arachnae_Que: [PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Queen, born alongside hundreds of sisters and sealed within the breeding chamber.\n\nWhen the wax sealing the Queen's breeding chamber was opened by the workers, [PAWN_nameDef] stood within—covered in blood and bodily fluids, trampling the broken limbs and bodies of her sisters—she was the undisputed sole winner of the survival game.

After successfully growing up in the hive, [PAWN_nameDef] left the nest where she was raised and came to an unfamiliar territory, preparing to establish her own influence.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] knows she is weak, and compared to her other pampered sisters, she is more willing to handle many things personally.
LanguageData.AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.Arachnae_Nod: [PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Overseer—this caste of Arachnae are the backbone of the hive, obeying the Queen's commands while also directing their subordinate Auxiliaries. They are born with different missions and diligently serve the swarm throughout their relatively short lifespan.
LanguageData.AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.Arachnae_Mim: [PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Mimic Nematode—they are not insectoids in the conventional sense. These parasites infest and control the bodies of sentient beings.

[PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Mimic Organism. Produced as a body infested and controlled by an Arachnae Mimic Nematode, she lacks her own conscious will and cannot survive independently without the Nematode parasite.
LanguageData.AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.Arachnae_Nod: [PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Honeypot Overseer. Selective gene expression has resulted in a swollen stomach sac and a complex proboscis, allowing her to consume unprocessed corpses and various omnivorous materials, which are then broken down by her digestive organs and converted into Arachnae Nectar for other swarm members.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] is not a formidable opponent in combat; her fighting skills are clumsy, and her fragile, bloated nature means she can hardly dodge any attacks.

[PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Shieldhead Overseer. The Shieldheads are bulky Arachnae insectoids with thick, often overgrown carapaces. Besides producing chitin, they possess auxiliary limbs for interfacing with weapon organs, enabling them to defend the hive using the swarm's weapon organs and their innate armor.

[PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Artificer Overseer. She can produce incubation cocoons specifically for hatching Arachnae weapon organs to enhance the hive's combat strength.\n\nAlthough [PAWN_nameDef] can wield weapon organs, she is extremely fearful of any harm, so try to prevent her from being directly exposed to attacks.

[PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Warrior Overseer. She can hunt and haul, and excels at operating all hive weapons, making her a formidable opponent in both melee and ranged combat. Although she cannot hatch Auxiliaries in the conventional sense, she can launch Arachnae Acid Maws at the enemy like projectiles, using the short lifespan of this Auxiliary to silence enemy ranged fire.

[PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Vapour Overseer, a rare large insectoid caste capable of mounting large weapon organs. She possesses a massive carapace that deters invaders, which conventional handheld weapons can hardly penetrate. She also has a huge vapour sac, which can use multiple biospouts to spray white adhesive matter and white smoke over a wide area, masking swarm assaults on enemy turret positions.

[PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Skyraider Overseer. As an elite unit among the Arachnae Overseers, the Skyraider caste has evolved powerful flight capabilities, making them the undisputed masters of the air in the hive.

[PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Prime Overseer. [PAWN_nameDef] uses a unique neuro-link tube to extend into and take over the victim's body. During the takeover, the skill proficiency will use the higher value between the Prime Caste and the victim, but any skill proficiency gained while parasitic will not be inherited by the Prime Caste when she leaves the victim.

[PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Weaver Overseer. Although supervised by the Queen, the Weaver caste possesses powerful advanced intelligence and self-will. Weavers can construct a highly interconnected neural network to conduct complex research and computational work. When performing computations, Weavers cannot perceive the external environment, making them vital protection targets for the swarm.

[PAWN_nameDef] is an Arachnae Praetorian Overseer. They are the elite troops of the Queen, responsible for executing her will. They can skillfully use ranged weapon organs to elegantly harvest enemies and hatch large numbers of Acid Maw Auxiliaries to establish defensive lines.
